name: The New Flesh
description:
EPILEPSY WARNING: This game contains flashing imagery which will be harmful for those with photosensitive epilepsy.

The event sent everyone's screens erupting into hideous, hungering amalgamations of flesh and metal. You were smart. You listened to the people they called crazy, you blocked out the bots and paid attention to the real experts. You sold your screen and prepared. Now you need to make your escape. But is escape even possible any more?

9+ monster types!

4 different endings!

Hidden secret areas !

A world that changes as you progress!

For fans of classic survival horror games!

Credits

Voice acting by Dea Barghest (@Geriatricwaifu)

Additional music by Capra/Corvus  (@CapraCorvus)
